website_summaries.verdict: Great for starters. This is an affordable combination that ensures each dive is safe.
pros: 2 quality pieces in 1 at an affordable price, make it a perfect package for beginners
Easy assembly, lightweight, and well made
cons: Not suited for more complex dives
Technical divers may want to look elsewhere for extra features and control

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for five dives so far. Nothing crazy, down to 30m. The set works really well, had no problems installing them. Can’t think of anything bad, works well for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Anders

customer_reviews.title: Not YOKE .... DIN.
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT yoke style .... it is DIN. Which os now a pain in the ass to convert all my tanks. At this point it would be best to return this. So disappointed as I ordered this so that I would be able to go diving this weekend. Poor!
customer_reviews.author: Elton K.

customer_reviews.title: Regulator Might Fail
customer_reviews.text: After 12 to 15 dives the regulator started to free flow... before that it would let a spray/mist of water into my mouth when i breathe in.
customer_reviews.author: Gattsu

customer_reviews.title: Great Regulator For A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great regulator. It worked perfectly for diving. Definitely recommend this regulator. We spent a week in the keys with it this summer diving and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: David Harder

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Works great, you will need to assemble hoses. Only has one (1) high pressure out of the five (5).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Just great to have it and price it was to me very good !
customer_reviews.author: Joestin O.

customer_reviews.title: Not for high pressure tanks!
customer_reviews.text: Does not work well over 2700 psi. Works OK on low pressure steel tanks though.
customer_reviews.author: Mr

customer_reviews.title: Great budget package.
customer_reviews.text: Simple. Works as expected. There is no free-flow adjustment on either reg. Would recommend if trying to buy some starter gear on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good gear. Easy assembly, All parts complete including o rings. Dove it 3 times already. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One pice yoke that does not swivel, so set it up right for console, regulator, vest, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price, great quality and the perfect back up regulator or for a new scuba diver who wants his or her own equipment, but at a tight budget. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lars M Lewander

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Used this regulator and there is a big difference between my old Oceanic and cressi reg. Not always worth skimping out on a reg. Will only keep it as a spare for warm water shallow dives.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Compares to the So Called, Best!
customer_reviews.text: I have had one for almost two years. I have dove to 40m with it without a single problem. The coldest temperature has been around 60*F still with no problems. When comparing with my MARES or ScubaPro, I actually prefer my Palantic. I am purchasing additional for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Tai

product_meta.title: Palantic AS101 Yoke Diving Dive Regulator and Octopus Combo (SCR-01-YOKE-207)
product_meta.description: 1st Stage Regulator Spec: - Maximum working pressure 3500PSI (232BAR). - Intermediate pressure output balanced piston 135-145PSI - Four 3/8-24 UNF-2B intermediate pressure ports - One 7/16-20 UNF-2B high pressure ports - Chromium plated bass body - Stainless steel springs. - Weight: 537 grams.
feature_bullets: High quality regulator first stage and second stage with 36" yellow hose on the octopus and black hose on the 2nd stage regulator
Environmental sealing prevents internal corrosion, contaminants, and icing of the first stage

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
